history.narrative: Law 3-108 was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 3-191, which was referred to the Committee on Transportation and Environmental Affairs. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on July 15, 1980 and July 29, 1980, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on July 31, 1980, it was assigned Act No. 3-233 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
